entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story who is being thrown around by Voldemort's followers.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The antagonist of the story who is leading his followers to taunt and humiliate Harry.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A large person who is tasked with carrying Harry's body.

entities.name: glasses
entities.description: Harry's glasses that are put back on his face by someone.

entities.name: wand
entities.description: A magical object that Harry has with him.

entities.name: castle
entities.description: The location where Voldemort and his followers plan to take Harry's body.

relationships.description: Voldemort is leading his followers to taunt and humiliate Harry.
Voldemort and his followers plan to take Harry's body to the castle.
Hagrid is tasked with carrying Harry's body.
